GameConsoleTest

类 PlayerTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameConsoleTest.PlayerTest

  • public class PlayerTest
extends java.lang.Object
    this class is a test class for testing if player owns the corresponding counties and can correctly get bonus from initial phase.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      PlayerTest() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void setUp()
      setUp initial game, loading a new map and adding new players.
      void testAttack()
      test class: Player, function attack(). check if the attacker and defender are valid.
      void testGetBonus()
      test class: Player, function: getBonus(). check the new game have the correctly corresponding players. check if player can get the bonus in the initial phase.
      void testHumanFortify()
      test class: Player. check the fortification phase
      void testMoveTroops()
      test class: Player, function: moveTroops(). check the valid move after player conquered a country
      void testStartupPhase()
      test class: Player. check the startup phase
      void testWinGame()
      test class: Player. check the end of the game when a player became the only player

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
